mapper.insert: insert into comtyReply(comtyNo, nickname, comtyReplyComent) values (#{comtyNo}, #{nickname}, #{comtyReplyComent})
mapper.update: update comtyReply set comtyReplyComent=#{comtyReplyComent} where comtyReplyNo=${comtyReplyNo} and nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.delete: delete from comtyReply where comtyReplyNo=#{param1} and nickname=#{param2}
